title: Yeo Martial
text:
Yeo Martial (born 2 January 1944) is an <a href="Ivory%20Coast">Ivorian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> manager. He managed the <a href="Ivory%20Coast%20national%20football%20team">Ivory Coast national team</a> to the <a href="1992%20African%20Cup%20of%20Nations">1992 African Cup of Nations</a>, and after a stint managing <a href="Africa%20Sports%20National">Africa Sports</a> and the <a href="Niger%20national%20football%20team">Niger national team</a>, he returned to Ivory Coast set up as Technical Director in 2004.
Martial also runs his own football academy, the <a href="%C3%89cole%20de%20Football%20Y%C3%A9o%20Martial">École de Football Yéo Martial</a>, in <a href="Abidjan">Abidjan</a>, established in 2001, which has an informal partnership with Italian side <a href="Parma%20F.C.">Parma</a>.
